using no-code templatesSend a notificationUpgrade your customer support chat experienceLearn moreProductsMessagingBuild scalable, feature-rich chat experiences in minutes with pre-built UI components.NEWIntegrate a conversational chatbot to your app for automated yet personalized responses to frequently asked questions.NEWSend in-app notifications with easy-to-use templates on Sendbird Dashboard or through integration with CRM tools you're already using.NEWOptimize chat moderation with advanced features to ensure safe, compliant, and inclusive online conversations in real-time.NEWIntegrate Salesforce Service Cloud and Einstein Bots with Sendbird Chat to provide prompt and comprehensive customer support.Manage and monitor customer support through APIs powered by Sendbird Chat and dashboard.Voice and videoBuild reliable voice and video call functionalities into your web or mobile apps.Implement real-time live streams with interactive chat features on your web or mobile apps.Featured samplesAdd or remove operators in group channels on Chat SDKThis code sample demonstrates how to add or remove operators in a group channel on Chat SDK for to ensure safe, compliant, and inclusive online conversations in real-time."}]}]},"ai-chatbot":{"id":"ai-chatbot","product":"AI Chatbot","title":"AI Chatbot","description":"A conversational chatbot that can be integrated into your app to provide automated responses to frequently asked questions.","detailDescription":"Sendbird’s AI Chatbot is a conversational chatbot that can be integrated into your app to provide automated responses to frequently asked questions. It is powered by a machine learning model that is trained on your historical chat data. The AI Chatbot can be used to provide automated responses to frequently asked questions, such as those related to shipping, returns, and order status. It can also be used to provide automated responses to frequently asked questions, such as those related to shipping, returns, and order status.","metaDescription":"View core features of Sendbird AI Chatbot and find the links to documentation by platform.","appDescription":"Integrate a conversational chatbot to your app for automated yet personalized responses to frequently asked questions.","categories":[{"category":"guide","version":"v1","supportedPlatforms":[],"documents":[{"type":"internal","link":"overview","description":"Learn how to use the AI Chatbot to manage your AI Chatbot."}]},{"category":"platform-api","version":"v3","supportedPlatforms":[],"documents":[{"type":"internal","name":"Platform API","linkData":[{"v3":"overview"}],"description":"Learn how to use the Platform API to manage your AI Chatbot."}]}]},"chat":{"id":"chat","product":"Chat","title":"Chat","description":"A suite of tools and resources designed for building and managing real-time chat experiences. It covers the necessities for developers to seamlessly integrate chat functionality into their application.","detailDescription":"With our Chat SDK, developers have access to a wide range of functions for creating custom chat experiences to suit their business needs. To streamline the development process, you can use the UIKit for Chat.This is a collection of pre-built UI components that developers can use to quickly implement user-friendly chat interfaces. Additionally, our Platform API provides server-side control over your chat functionality.While the native SDKs handle many of the requests and responses on the client side, Platform API allows developers to manage and manipulate chat functionalities directly from their server.","metaDescription":"View core features of Sendbird Chat and find the links to documentation by Additionally, our Platform API provides server-side control over your live functionality.While the native SDKs handle many of the requests and responses on the client side, Platform API allows developers to manage and manipulate chat functionalities directly from their server.","metaDescription":"View core features of Sendbird Live Beta and find the links to documentation by platform and It delivers the necessary resources for developers to effortlessly integrate call features tailored to their business requirements.","detailDescription":"Sendbird offers Call SDK, providing developers an extensive array of functions for implementing high-quality voice and video calls for web and mobile apps with real-time interactions.
